attributes.action: Stop turning this country into a joke
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: You, Mr 'Prime minister' are a joke, you are turning our country into a global laughing stock, and we, the people, demand change NOW!!!! We have been having our throats cut by this government for far to long. For starters I shall turn your attention to our so called 'freedom' what exactly is freedom, when we can be arrested for saying what we think?!? Its a sham, you know it, we know it, and it has to stop!

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
